item.title: Effect of drug treatment on cellular metabolism (targeted LC/MS metabolomics analysis)
item.description: Setup Packages: Data: Abundances: Compounds: Functions: Exploratory Analysis NA per sample and per compound Empty/Solv vs Sample Files Cell / Neg Cell / Pos Media / Neg Media / Pos Data prep and prelim analysis NA replacement and log transform Distribution plots: Exploratory PCA Statistical analysis VPA metabolism Signifiance Testing using Limma Cells / Neg Mode Media / Neg Mode Cells / Pos Mode Media / Pos Mode Pathway analysis Setup Packages: library(tidyverse) library(cowplot) library(GGally) library(heatmaply) library(sva) library(limma) library(biobroom) library(ggridges) Data: Abundances: # Cells # cell.
